bug.question: I have six legs and like to march. I often carry crumbs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I'm very small and work with many others.
🧺 I can be found at picnics.
🔴 Sometimes you find me in your kitchen if you leave food out.

bug.question: I can fly and have bright, colorful wings. I start as a caterpillar. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I eat a lot of leaves when I'm young.
🦋 I am a symbol of transformation.

bug.question: I make honey and live in a hive. I have a stinger. What am I?
I am red with black spots and considered lucky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am a type of beetle.
🍀 Some people believe I bring good fortune.
🪴 Gardeners like me because I eat aphids.

bug.question: I chirp loudly, especially in the summer. I have strong legs for jumping. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 I rub my legs together to make noise.

bug.question: I glow in the dark and fly around at night. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ My light helps me find a mate.
🌃 You see me when it's dark.
🪲 I am also called a lightning bug.

bug.question: I am long and skinny, and I wiggle through the dirt. I help plants grow. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I make the soil better for plants.
🌧️ You see me after it rains.

bug.question: I bite and leave itchy bumps. I fly and buzz around your ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🌃 I can keep you awake at night.

bug.question: I spin a sticky web to catch my dinner. I have eight legs, not six. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ Some people are scared of me.
🪰 Flies get trapped in my home.

bug.question: I am a master of disguise, looking like a twig or a leaf. This helps me hide from predators. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I can be green or brown.
🧍 You might mistake me for part of a plant.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I love peanuts! Who am I?

hints.text: 💦 I use my trunk to drink water.

animal.question: I say 'Meow' and like to chase mice. I purr when I'm happy. Who am I?
I wag my tail and bark. I love to play fetch. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐕‍🦺 I can be a loyal companion.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes, and I live in Africa. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦓 My stripes help me blend in.

animal.question: I quack and swim in the pond. I lay eggs. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌧️ I enjoy being in the rain.

animal.question: I have a long neck and spots. I eat leaves from tall trees. Who am I?

hints.text: 🍃 My favorite food is acacia leaves.

animal.question: I roar and I'm the king of the jungle. I have a big mane. Who am I?

hints.text: 👑 I am a symbol of courage.

animal.question: I hop around and eat carrots. I have long ears. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐇 I can be white, brown, or black.
🌱 I like to eat leafy greens.

animal.question: I slither and have no legs. Some of us are venomous. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I can be found in many environments, including jungles and deserts.

animal.question: I am a large sea mammal that uses echolocation. I am very intelligent and love to play. What am I?
